survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and priorities when planning home renovations to help businesses tailor their services and products accordingly.

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your current home renovation plans?
answer_options: Planning a minor renovation (e.g., single room update)
Planning a major renovation (e.g., multiple rooms or full home)
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This question helps segment respondents for further questions.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your current home renovation plans?
answer_options: Planning a minor renovation (e.g., single room update)
Planning a major renovation (e.g., multiple rooms or full home)

questions.question_text: What is the primary motivation for your home renovation?
questions.routing_logic: Only show if Q1 answer is 'Planning a minor renovation' or 'Planning a major renovation'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with open-text input.

script.question_text: What is your estimated budget for the renovation?
script.routing_logic: Only show if Q1 answer is 'Planning a minor renovation' or 'Planning a major renovation'

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. This helps identify key marketing channels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: How do you typically research home renovation products or services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a contractor or design professional? (Rank top 3)
questions.routing_logic: Only show if Q1 answer is 'Planning a minor renovation' or 'Planning a major renovation'
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type where respondents can drag and drop or select their top 3 choices.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a contractor or design professional? (Rank top 3)
script.routing_logic: Only show if Q1 answer is 'Planning a minor renovation' or 'Planning a major renovation'

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about the environmental impact of your renovation?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring intensity of concern.

script.question_text: How concerned are you about the environmental impact of your renovation?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for eco-friendly or sustainable materials?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small premium
No, I would not pay extra
questions.routing_logic: Only show if Q7 answer is 'Very concerned' or 'Somewhat concerned'
questions.client_notes: This helps gauge willingness to invest in sustainability.

answer_options: Yes, but only a small premium
No, I would not pay extra

questions.question_text: What is your biggest concern or hesitation about undertaking a home renovation?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to uncover potential pain points.
